Daytona_Beach.Daytona Beach International Airport: Daytona Beach International Airport (IATA: DAB, ICAO: KDAB, FAA LID: DAB) is a county owned airport located three miles (5 km) southwest of Daytona Beach, next to Daytona International Speedway, in Volusia County, Florida, United States. The airport has 3 runways, a six-gate domestic terminal, and an international terminal. Daytona Beach is the headquarters of Embry-Riddle Aeronautical University.
